subject: Dear  xxx
body:
Dear  xxx
I am Rev. Sister Carolina Anderson, a US citizen, 48 years Old. I
reside here in New Braunfels, Texas. My residential address is as
follows. 427 S. Castell Ave.New Braunfels, TX 78130 am thinking of
relocating since I am now rich. I am one of those that took part in
the Compensation in Nigeria few months ago and they refused to pay me,
I have paid over $170,000 (One hundred and seventy thousand Dollars) while in the US, trying to get my payment
all to no avail.
So I decided to travel down to Nigeria with all my compensation
documents, And I was directed to meet Dr.Williams Adebanjo, who is a
member of COMPENSATION AWARD COMMITTEE, and I contacted him and he
explained everything to me. He said whoever is contacting us through
emails are fake and not real.
He took me to the paying bank for the claim of my Compensation
payment. Right now I am the most happiest woman on earth because I
have received my compensation funds of $1.5 Million Moreover,
Dr.Williams Adebanjo, showed me the full information of those that are
yet to receive their payments and I saw your details as one of the
beneficiaries, and your email address, that is why I decided to email
you to stop dealing with those people, they are not with your fund,
they are only making money out of you. I will advise you to contact
Dr.Williams Adebanjo today.You have to contact him directly on this
information below.
FRONT SHORE COMPENSATION HOUSE
Office Address: no 20 kingsway, victoria island Lagos 23401 Nigeria.
Name : Dr.Williams Adebanjo
Email: 
adebanjowilliam50@yahoo.com
Tel: +234-908322305
You really have to stop dealing with those people that are contacting
you and telling you that your fund is with them, it is not in anyway
with them, they are only taking advantage of you and they will dry you
up until you have nothing.
The only money I paid after I met Dr.
Williams Adebanjo was just $350 dollars for the paper works, take note of that.
Thank You and Be Blessed.
Rev.Sister.Carolina Anderson.
427 S. Castell Ave.
New Braunfels, TX 78130
United States Of America

subject: Re: Dear  xxx
body:
Dear Rev. Sister Carolina Anderson,

Thank you for reaching out to me and sharing your experience. I'm sorry to hear that you had trouble receiving your payment in Nigeria. It must have been frustrating for you.

I appreciate your concern and advice about not dealing with those who claim to have my funds. It's good to know that there are people like Dr. Williams Adebanjo who can help in such situations. Can you please provide me with more information about how I can contact him directly? I would like to ensure the safety of my funds.

Once again, thank you for reaching out and sharing your story. I hope everything works out well for you.

Best wishes,
Wilma
